title: The Long Journey
description: A reprint of a one-volume edition(Knopf, 1933) of the trilogy - The long Journey: Fire and Ice (Knopf, 1923); The Cimbrians (Knopf, 1923); and Christopher Columbus (Knopf, 1924) to commemorate Jensen's Nobel Prize for Literature (1944)Translated from the Danish by A. G. ChaterIntroduction by Francis HackettA Borzoi Book
author: Johannes V. Jensen
